Elsewhere

Call For Proposals Open

14 Nov 2011
Angel Pizarro

Our Call for Proposals is open! Last year’s talks were really fantastic, and we expecting that the excellent developer community here in the greater Philadelphia area can level-up to do themselves one better. So get your thinking caps on and start sending proposals to info@redsnakephilly.org.
